thread.title: Joanna Kent
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Joanna Kent

author: Joanna Kent
title: Joanna Kent
text: I was charged Â£40 for a bunch of flowers that consisted of 8 flowers which half of them were dead or damaged, a replacement bunch was sent out and that was worse that the first one! A refund was refused. Customer services are shocking! I would NEVER use or recommend anyone using this company. Disgusting.
